      DND 5E 2024

      Children of the Grain

      One-shot Aventure

      The people of Eden’s Rest have sent for help. Their livelihood is at risk, and they need capable travelers to set things right. It sounds simple—at least, that’s how it’s told.

      TBD
      2-5 players

      DND 5e 2024

      Descent into Avernus

      Long-term Campaign

      When the city of Elturel vanishes into the fiery depths of Avernus, a band of desperate heroes must descend into the first layer of Hell to save its people—and their own souls—from the bargains that brought it there.

      TBD
      3-5 players
      recruiting
      DND 5E 2024

      Freedom!

      4 Session One-shot

      Freedom! is a classic Dark Sun adventure where enslaved heroes spark a rebellion in the brutal city-state of Tyr, igniting a desperate fight for liberty under the burning crimson sun.

      TBD
      4-5 players
      recruiting
      Daggerheart

      The Sablewood Messengers

      A Quickstart Adventure for New & Returning Heroes

      The Sablewood Messengers is a cozy but perilous Daggerheart adventure about a group of trusted couriers journeying through an ancient, whispering forest to deliver a mysterious magical package that’s far more important than it seems.

      TBD
      2-5 players
